english.segment1: When the question never set before me. Can I feel it out once more. You are my full ambition. I walked on water. I'm sick of talking now
english.segment2: I want You by my side. So close that I can feel You breathing. I won't turn my head, be misguided. I need a breather
english.segment3: You take my breath away. You take my breath away (2x)
english.segment4: Stay here just enough to catch me when I'm falling
english.segment5: You fill me up just like a big balloon of helium. Can't get enough I want some more come on and fill me up. When I'm with You there ain't no other place I'd rather be. I just open up and receive Him. and He set me free
